title: @Riot, a thank you from PAX, EB Expo and Armageddon cosplayers.
body:
First up, I've not used the boards before so I'm totally lost as to where to post this. I hope I'm doing okay? Also the link below is huuuuuge so if your computer cries, crashes and burns, you've been forewarned. I also didn't add the link in where the link is meant to go (?) just in case people click on it by accident (as the size is ridiculous). 

Onto the scheduled entertainment!

Riot, you are *incredible.* Your work at the Oceanic PAX, EB Expo and Armageddon last year was absolutely phenomenal, especially in regards to your unwavering support of League cosplayers, not only here but around the world.  

As a thank you, myself, Sinly and Fluffy Shoggoth have been working on a little something to thank you. We've been collecting photos of cosplayers across Australia to collage together a huge thank you card from *everyone* you've inspired, helped out, and supported along the way. Whilst this is obviously a thank you to every Rioter out there, there's a few we need to single out to thank personally. 

To Riot Achenar, (who is an absolute superstar in maintaining her role as our fairy cosmother) and Riot Crucius, for handling all 170+ League cosplayers at PAX and making sure the show ran smoothly, and ensuring our cosplay swag was delivered to the hundreds of League cosplayers across Australia, New Zealand and probably a few over the rest of the world too. Thank you! We hope this small token of our appreciation is a thank you enough for all the incredible work you've done. 

(I'd also like to personally thank Riot Achenar for convincing me I was not going to fall down the stage steps when I had to go up there blind, and still ended up falling down them.)

[If this doesn't open properly, hit the three dots in the lower right and 'View Original'.](https://www.dropbox.com/s/pf32q04fnzdxdig/card.png?dl=0
)
